security.title: Security
security.content: Funds are escrowed in open-source, secure smart contracts, and cannot be diverted for other purposes.

credible.title: Credible
credible.content: Each task will be issued with SBT to form an immutable reputation, you can find the most suitable developer.

openness.title: Openness
openness.content: No permission, no censorship, with token payments, be free to post the tasks at anytime, anywhere.

item1.title: Find Developers
item1.p1: As a project owner, be free to post a task.
item1.p3: Pay with token , controled by smart contract.

item2.title: Find Tasks
item2.p1: As a developer, you can explore task.
item2.p2: Offer the bid with a plan.
item2.p3: Try best to do the task.
item2.p4: Complete tasks, earn SBT, and build trust.

item1.content: Detask is the best partner for Web3 development and I can always find the right person to complete my projects.

item2.content: I always want to participate in the Web3 project, but I need a good search portal. Thank God, here it is! For those who want to participate in the Web3 project, this is really good.

item3.content: Detask - the Web3 community with Efficient, Fair, Credible and Valuable. Without the help of Detask, I might not find such suitable and capable talent to complete the project and achieve my goal.
